Hypertable::Locker

Hypertable::Locker< MutexT > Class Template Reference

boost::mutex::scoped_lock use lock_ops<mutex>::lock/unlock in pre 1.35 which makes it less convenient than the following which can be used to guard any object (besides a typical mutex) with lock/unlock methods More...

Detailed Description

template<class MutexT>
class Hypertable::Locker< MutexT >

boost::mutex::scoped_lock use lock_ops<mutex>::lock/unlock in pre 1.35 which makes it less convenient than the following which can be used to guard any object (besides a typical mutex) with lock/unlock methods
